content:
At midnight in Kharkiv, a three -storey building occurred in the city as a result of an enemy UAV strike in the city.

About thisinformsSES of Ukraine.

The scene immediately arrived at the SES and the National Police.

During the work of rescuers and law enforcement officers at the scene, the enemy struck the UAV.

The impact was injured by an employee of the SES and the National Police. Two SES cars were also damaged.

"The aggressor country continues to consciously destroy those who are protecting the safety of peaceful people," the SES stressed.

As reported by the Armyinform, tonight mobile fire groups of defense forces, anti -aircraft missile units and air forces aviation31 "Shahed" destroyed.
title: In Kharkiv, a rescuer and a police officer were injured during a recurrent enemy shelling
description: About it reports the SES of Ukraine. The SES and ...
author: Army Inform
